00018 XThreadLocal<std::deque<shared_ptr<XNode> > > XNode::stl_thisCreating;

00020 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------
00021 XNode::XNode(const char *name, bool runtime)
00022     : m_children(), m_name(name ? name : "")
00023 {
00024     // temporaly shared_ptr to be able to use shared_from_this() in constructors
00025     XNode::stl_thisCreating->push_back(shared_ptr<XNode>(this));
00026     ASSERT(shared_from_this());
00027     m_flags = (runtime ? FLAG_RUNTIME : 0) | FLAG_UI_ENABLED | FLAG_ENABLED;
00028     dbgPrint(QString("xnode %1 is created., addr=0x%2, size=0x%3")
00029              .arg(getName())
00030              .arg((uintptr_t)this, 0, 16)
00031              .arg((uintptr_t)sizeof(XNode), 0, 16));
00032 }
00033 XNode::~XNode() {
00034     dbgPrint(QString("xnode %1 is being deleted., addr=0x%2").arg(getName()).arg((uintptr_t)this, 0, 16));
00035 }
00036 XString
00037 XNode::getName() const {
00038     return m_name;
00039 }
00040 XString
00041 XNode::getTypename() const {
00042     XString name = typeid(*this).name();
00043     int i = name.find('X');
00044     ASSERT(i != std::string::npos);
00045     ASSERT(i + 1 < name.length());
00046     return name.substr(i + 1);
00047 }
00048 void
00049 XNode::insert(const shared_ptr<XNode> &ptr)
00050 {
00051     ASSERT(ptr);
00052     if(!ptr->m_parent.lock())
00053         ptr->m_parent = shared_from_this();
00054     for(;;) {
00055         atomic_shared_ptr<NodeList> old_list(m_children);
00056         atomic_shared_ptr<NodeList> new_list(old_list ? (new NodeList(*old_list)) : (new NodeList));        
00057         new_list->push_back(ptr);
00058         if(new_list.compareAndSwap(old_list, m_children)) break;
00059     }
00060 }
00061 void
00062 XNode::disable() {
00063     for(;;) {
00064         int flag = m_flags;
00065         if(atomicCompareAndSet(flag, flag & ~(FLAG_ENABLED | FLAG_UI_ENABLED), &m_flags))
00066             break;
00067     }
00068     onUIEnabled().talk(shared_from_this());
00069 }
00070 void
00071 XNode::setUIEnabled(bool v) {
00072     if(!isEnabled()) return;
00073     for(;;) {
00074         int flag = m_flags;
00075         if(atomicCompareAndSet(flag, v ? (flag | FLAG_UI_ENABLED) : (flag & ~FLAG_UI_ENABLED), &m_flags))
00076             break;
00077     }
00078     onUIEnabled().talk(shared_from_this());
00079 }
00080 void
00081 XNode::touch() {
00082     onTouch().talk(shared_from_this());
00083 }
00084 
00085 void
00086 XNode::clearChildren()
00087 {
00088     m_children.reset();
00089 }
00090 int
00091 XNode::releaseChild(const shared_ptr<XNode> &node)
00092 {
00093 //  node->m_parent.reset();
00094     for(;;) {
00095         atomic_shared_ptr<NodeList> old_list(m_children);
00096         if(!old_list) return -1;
00097         atomic_shared_ptr<NodeList> new_list(new NodeList(*old_list));
00098         NodeList::iterator it = find(new_list->begin(), new_list->end(), node);
00099         if(it == new_list->end()) return -1;
00100         new_list->erase(it);
00101         if(new_list->empty())
00102             new_list.reset();
00103         if(new_list.compareAndSwap(old_list, m_children)) break;
00104     }
00105     return 0;
00106 }
00107 
00108 shared_ptr<XNode>
00109 XNode::getChild(const XString &var) const
00110 {
00111     shared_ptr<XNode> node;
00112     atomic_shared_ptr<const XNode::NodeList> list(children());
00113     if(list) { 
00114         for(XNode::NodeList::const_iterator it = list->begin(); it != list->end(); it++) {
00115             if((*it)->getName() == var) {
00116                 node = *it;
00117                 break;
00118             }
00119         }
00120     }
00121     return node;
00122 }
00123 shared_ptr<XNode>
00124 XNode::getParent() const
00125 {
00126     return m_parent.lock();
00127 }

00130     XNode(name, runtime), m_validator(0L)
00131 {
00132 }
00133 void
00134 XValueNodeBase::str(const XString &s) throw (XKameError &) {
00135     XString sc(s);
00136     if(m_validator)
00137         (*m_validator)(sc);
00138     _str(sc);
00139 }
00140 void
00141 XValueNodeBase::setValidator(Validator v) {
00142     m_validator = v;

00145 template <typename T, int base>
00146 void
00147 XValueNode<T, base>::value(const T &t) {
00148     if(m_tlkBeforeValueChanged.empty() && m_tlkOnValueChanged.empty()) {
00149         m_var = t;
00150     }
00151     else {
00152         XScopedLock<XRecursiveMutex> lock(m_valuemutex);
00153         shared_ptr<XValueNodeBase> ptr = 
00154             dynamic_pointer_cast<XValueNodeBase>(shared_from_this());
00155         m_tlkBeforeValueChanged.talk(ptr);
00156         m_var = t;
00157         m_tlkOnValueChanged.talk(ptr); //, 1, &statusmutex);
00158     }
00159 }

00161 template <>
00162 void
00163 XValueNode<int, 10>::_str(const XString &str) throw (XKameError &) {
00164     bool ok;
00165     int var = QString(str).toInt(&ok, 10);
00166     if(!ok)
00167         throw XKameError(i18n("Ill string conversion to integer."), __FILE__, __LINE__);
00168     value(var);
00169 }
00170 template <>
00171 void
00172 XValueNode<unsigned int, 10>::_str(const XString &str) throw (XKameError &) {
00173     bool ok;
00174     unsigned int var = QString(str).toUInt(&ok);
00175     if(!ok)
00176         throw XKameError(i18n("Ill string conversion to unsigned integer."), __FILE__, __LINE__);
00177     value(var);
00178 }
00179 template <>
00180 void
00181 XValueNode<unsigned int, 16>::_str(const XString &str) throw (XKameError &) {
00182     bool ok;
00183     unsigned int var = QString(str).toUInt(&ok, 16);
00184     if(!ok)
00185         throw XKameError(i18n("Ill string conversion to hex."), __FILE__, __LINE__);
00186     value(var);
00187 }
00188 template <>
00189 void
00190 XValueNode<bool, 10>::_str(const XString &str) throw (XKameError &) {
00191     bool ok;
00192     bool x = QString(str).toInt(&ok);
00193     if(ok) {
00194         value( x ? true : false );
00195         return;
00196     }
00197     if(QString(str).trimmed().toLower() == "true") {
00198         value(true); return;
00199     }
00200     if(QString(str).trimmed().toLower() == "false") {
00201         value(false); return;
00202     }
00203     throw XKameError(i18n("Ill string conversion to boolean."), __FILE__, __LINE__);
00204 }

00206 template <typename T, int base>
00207 XString
00208 XValueNode<T, base>::to_str() const {
00209     return QString::number(m_var, base);
00210 }
00211 template <>
00212 XString
00213 XValueNode<bool, 10>::to_str() const {
00214     return m_var ? "true" : "false";
00215 }

00218 template class XValueNode<unsigned int, 10>;
00219 template class XValueNode<unsigned int, 16>;
00220 template class XValueNode<bool, 10>;

00226 XStringNode::to_str() const

00228     return m_var;

00232 {

00236 XStringNode::operator XString() const {
00237     return to_str();
00238 }
00239 void
00240 XStringNode::value(const XString &t) {
00241     if(beforeValueChanged().empty() && onValueChanged().empty()) {
00242         m_var = t;
00243     }
00244     else {
00245         XScopedLock<XRecursiveMutex> lock(m_valuemutex);
00246         beforeValueChanged().talk(dynamic_pointer_cast<XValueNodeBase>(shared_from_this()));
00247         m_var = t;
00248         onValueChanged().talk(dynamic_pointer_cast<XValueNodeBase>(shared_from_this()));
00249     }
00250 }

00252 XDoubleNode::XDoubleNode(const char *name, bool runtime, const char *format)
00253     : XValueNodeBase(name, runtime), m_var(0.0)
00254 {
00255     if(format)
00256         setFormat(format);
00257     else
00258         setFormat("");
00259 }
00260 XString
00261 XDoubleNode::to_str() const
00262 {
00263     return formatDouble(m_format.c_str(), m_var);
00264 }
00265 void
00266 XDoubleNode::_str(const XString &str) throw (XKameError &)
00267 {
00268     bool ok;
00269     double var = QString(str).toDouble(&ok);
00270     if(!ok) 
00271         throw XKameError(i18n("Ill string conversion to double float."), __FILE__, __LINE__);
00272     value(var);
00273 }
00274 void
00275 XDoubleNode::value(const double &t) {
00276     if(beforeValueChanged().empty() && onValueChanged().empty()) {
00277         m_var = t;
00278     }
00279     else {
00280         XScopedLock<XRecursiveMutex> lock(m_valuemutex);
00281         beforeValueChanged().talk(dynamic_pointer_cast<XValueNodeBase>(shared_from_this()));
00282         m_var = t;
00283         onValueChanged().talk(dynamic_pointer_cast<XValueNodeBase>(shared_from_this()));
00284     }
00285 }
00286 XDoubleNode::operator double() const
00287 {
00288     return m_var;
00289 }
00290 
00291 const char *
00292 XDoubleNode::format() const {
00293     return m_format.c_str();
00294 }
00295 void
00296 XDoubleNode::setFormat(const char* format) {
00297     XString fmt;
00298     if(format) fmt = format;
00299     try {
00300         formatDoubleValidator(fmt);
00301         m_format = fmt;
00302     }
00303     catch (XKameError &e) {
00304         e.print();
00305     }
00306 }
